member.name: M:RestClient.Net.RestClientExtensions.AddRestClient(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{RestClient.Net.CreateClientOptions})
member.summary: Adds CreateClient to the container so you can mint IClients. Use this overload if you need to configure a singleton IClient
member.param: Specify this to configure a singleton IClient

member.name: M:RestClient.Net.RestClientExtensions.AddRestClient(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{RestClient.Net.CreateClientOptions},System.Func{System.String,RestClient.Net.CreateClientOptions,System.IServiceProvider,RestClient.Net.IClient})
member.summary: Adds CreateClient to the container so you can mint IClients. Use this overload if you don't need to configure a singleton IClient (i.e. you will use CreateClient instead)
member.param: Specify this if you need to configure a singleton IClient
Specify this if you need to take control of construction
